autocomplete.title: Autocompletion
autocomplete.doc: To auto-complete nicknames, channels, commands, and emoji, type one of the characters below to open a suggestion list. Use the <kbd>↑</kbd> and <kbd>↓</kbd> keys to highlight an item, and insert it by pressing <kbd>Tab</kbd> or <kbd>Enter</kbd> (or by clicking the desired item).
autocomplete.disable: Autocompletion can be disabled in settings.

help.title: Help
help.switch_channels: Switch to the previous/next window in the channel list
help.colored_text: Mark any text typed after this shortcut to be colored. After hitting this shortcut, enter an integer in the range 0—15 to select the desired color, or use the autocompletion menu to choose a color name (see below).
help.colored_background: Background color can be specified by putting a comma and another integer in the range 0—15 after the foreground color number (autocompletion works too).
help.colored_docs: A color reference can be found here.
help.bold_text: Mark all text typed after this shortcut as bold.
help.underlined_text: Mark all text typed after this shortcut as underlined.
help.italic_text: Mark all text typed after this shortcut as italics.
help.strikethrough_text: Mark all text typed after this shortcut as struck through.
help.monospace_text: Mark all text typed after this shortcut as monospaced.
help.reset_formatting: Mark all text typed after this shortcut to be reset to its original formatting.
help.switch_next_prev_window: Switch to the previous/next window in the channel list

changelog.title: Introduction
changelog.github_failure: Unable to retrieve releases from GitHub.
changelog.view_on_github: View release notes for this version on GitHub

commands.away: Mark yourself as away with an optional message
commands.ban: Ban (+b) a user from the current channel. This can be a nickname or a hostmask.
commands.banlist: Load the banlist for the current channel.
commands.connect: Connect to a new IRC network. If port starts with a + sign, the connection will be made secure using TLS.
commands.deop: Remove op (-o) from one or several user in the current channel.
commands.devoice: Remove voice (-v) from one or several users in the current channel.
commands.disconnect: Disconnect from the current network with an optionally-provided message.
commands.invite: Invite a user to the specified channel. If channel is omitted, user will be invited to the current channel.
commands.kick: Kick a user from the current channel.
commands.list: Retrieve a list of available channels on this network.
commands.me: Send an action message to the current channel. The Lounge will display it inline, as if the message was posted in the third person.
commands.mode: Set the given flags to the current channel if the active window is a channel, another user if the active window is a private message window, or yourself if the current window is a server window.
commands.msg: Send a message to the specified channel.
commands.nick: Change your nickname on the current network.
commands.notice: Sends a notice message to the specified channel.
commands.op: Give op (+o) to one or several users in the current channel.
commands.part: Close the specified channel or private message window, or the current channel if channel is ommitted.
commands.query: Send a private message to the specified user.
commands.quit: Disconnect from the current network with an optional message.
commands.raw: Send a raw message to the current IRC network.
commands.rejoin: Leave and immediately rejoin the current channel. Useful to quickly get op from ChanServ in an empty channel, for example.
commands.slap: Slap someone in the current channel with a trout!
commands.topic: Set the topic in the current channel.
commands.unban: Unban (-b) from the current channel. This can be a nickname or a hostmask.
commands.voice: Give voice (+v) to one or several users in the current channel.
commands.whois: Retrieve information about the given user on the current network.

about.title: About The Lounge
about.running_from_source: The Lounge is running from source

client.exit_warning: Are you sure you want to navigate away from this page?

password.change_fail_entered_not_match: Both new password fields must match
password.change_fail_entered_not_match_account: The current password field does not match your account password
password.change_success: Successfully updated your password, all your other sessions were logged out

error.not_connected: You are not connected to the IRC network, unable to send your command.
error.hostname_not_allowed: Hostname you specified is not allowed.
error.specify_hostname: You must specify a hostname to connect.
error.msg_not_sent_lobby: Messages can not be sent to lobbies.
error.command_in_channels: {{cmd}} can only be used in channels.
error.command_in_channels_and_queries: {{cmd}} command can only be used in channels and queries.
error.command_in_channels_or_spec_target: {{cmd}} command can only be used in channels or by specifying a target.
error.cannot_query_channel: You can not open query windows for channels, use /join instead.
error.cannot_query_prefix: You can not open query windows for names starting with a user prefix.
error.cannot_part_network: You can not part from networks, use /quit instead.

server.loading_channel_list: Loading channel list, this can take a moment...
server.disconnected_network_will_not_reconnect: Disconnected from the network, and will not reconnect. Use /connect to reconnect again.
server.disconnected_retry: Disconnected from the network. Reconnecting in {{seconds}} seconds… (Attempt {{attempt}} of {{max_retries}})
